subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in California sided with Lance Armstrong and the publishers of his autobiographies, rejecting claims in a lawsuit that lies about not using performance-enhancing drugs amounted to fraud and false advertising.
snippet: A federal judge in California sided with Lance Armstrong and the publishers of his autobiographies, rejecting claims in a lawsuit that lies about not using performance-enhancing drugs amounted to fraud and false advertising.
